这里有很多人。: 她是中国人，也会说英语。
Tā shì Zhōngguó rén, yě huì shuō Yīngyǔ.
She is Chinese and can also speak English.

这里有很多人。: 我爸爸每天早上喝咖啡。
Wǒ bàba měitiān zǎoshang hē kāfēi.
My father drinks coffee every morning.
My mother works at a hospital.
My grandfather likes to take a walk every day.

Tā de érzi jīnnián wǔ suì.
His son is five years old this year.

这里有很多人。: 我女儿跟我一起学中文。
Wǒ nǚ’ér gēn wǒ yìqǐ xué Zhōngwén.
My daughter studies Chinese together with me.

这里有很多人。: 孩子们放学以后去公园玩。
Háizimen fàngxué yǐhòu qù gōngyuán wán.
The children go to the park to play after school.

这里有很多人。: 周末我和朋友一起吃饭。
Zhōumò wǒ hé péngyou yìqǐ chīfàn.
On the weekend, I eat together with friends.
She lives together with her girlfriend.

Wǒ àirén xiàbān yǐhòu huí jiā.
My spouse goes home after work.

Āyí gěi wǒmen zuò le wǎnfàn.

My older brother is a bit taller than me.

Dìdi zhèngzài fángjiān lǐ kàn shū.
My younger brother is reading in his room.
My older sister is very busy because of work.
My younger sister likes listening to music.
